activities: VaultLogix is an online data backup company.  We store client data on our data vaults in a proprietary software format which utilizes compression and encryption to store data on our physically secure data vaults.  It is possible for a client to store private information on our vaults.  The data would be transferred and securely stored using encryption.  The majority of VaultLogix clients are located within the United States with a small percentage located outside of the U.S.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: VaultLogix does not have any requirements for gathering personal data.  As a B2B company VaultLogix does not require personal information.  In the event that personal information was gathered VaultLogix complies withThe Massachusetts General Law Chapter 93H and its new regulations 201 CMR 17.00.
privacyprograms: United States GSA as well as SOC2 Type 2 audit completion.  In addition, The Massachusetts General Law Chapter 93H and its new regulations 201 CMR 17.00
